data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Jorge Antonio Padilla Leal of Mazatlan smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Mazatlan at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 6, Efrain Velarde is booked for the away team.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Pachuca.
Can Pachuca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mazatlan's half?
In the minute 9, Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Pachuca's Oscar Murillo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Mazatlan goal kick.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
Mazatlan have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
In the minute 13, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
Pachuca's Oscar Murillo is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in the half of Pachuca.
In the minute 16, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Victor Davila.
Erick Aguirre instrumental with a fine assist.
Pachuca needs to be cautious. Mazatlan have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 18, It's a goal kick for the home team in Pachuca de Soto.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Pachuca throw-in in Mazatlan's half.
In the minute 20, Roberto de la Rosa (Pachuca) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Pachuca just outside Mazatlan's area.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 21, Oscar Murillo heads in to give Pachuca a 2-0 lead at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
That's a fine assist from Luis Chavez.
Mazatlan to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
In the minute 23, Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
Free kick Pachuca.
Nicolas Diaz (Mazatlan) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 25, Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
In the minute 29, Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in the half of Pachuca.
In the minute 31, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Mazatlan throw-in in Pachuca's half.
Mazatlan are in shooting range from this free kick.
Oscar Murillo (Pachuca) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of Pachuca.
Rodrigo Salinas Dorantes (Pachuca) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 34, Mazatlan to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
Fernando Aristeguieta (Mazatlan) heads in to reduce the deficit to 2-1.
In the minute 37, Martin Rodriguez with an assist there.
In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of Pachuca.
In the minute 39, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In the minute 41, Pachuca drives forward and Rodrigo Salinas Dorantes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Pachuca.
In the minute 45, Throw-in high up the field for Pachuca in Pachuca de Soto.
Mazatlan pushes forward through Luis Mendoza, whose finish on goal is saved.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Mazatlan's Nicolas Diaz breaks free at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Pachuca a goal kick.
Rodrigo Millar is replacing Miguel Sansores for the away team.
Paulo Pezzolano (Pachuca) is making a second substitution, with Kevin Alvarez replacing Rodrigo Salinas Dorantes.
Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
In the minute 48, In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jose Ortiz gets an equalizer for Mazatlan. The score is now 2-2.
Great play from Martin Rodriguez to set up the goal.
In the minute 50, Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the home team a throw-in.
Rodrigo Salinas Dorantes for Pachuca gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
In the minute 53, Throw-in Mazatlan.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Mazatlan.
Ball safe as Mazatlan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 55, Mazatlan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mazatlan to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Pachuca a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Romario Ibarra is replacing Luis Chavez for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 57, Mazatlan have a goal kick.
Victor Sosa is on a sub for Roberto de la Rosa for Pachuca.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Kevin Alvarez of Pachuca smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 60, Mazatlan drive upfield and Nicolas Diaz gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Pachuca defender.
Throw-in Pachuca.
Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
In the minute 62, Jorge Antonio Padilla Leal (Mazatlan) has received a first yellow card.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Pachuca.
In the minute 63, Francisco Palencia is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo with Ivan Moreno replacing Luis Mendoza.
The away team replace Fernando Aristeguieta with Camilo Sanvezzo.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Pachuca throw-in in Mazatlan's half.
In the minute 64, Pachuca's Jorge Hernandez is on target but unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The away team have replaced Efrain Velarde with Candido Ramirez. This is the fourth substitution made today by Francisco Palencia.
In the minute 66, Pachuca make their fourth substitution with Leonardo Ramos replacing Victor Davila.
Felipe Pardo scores with a header and the home team now lead 3-2.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 69, Pachuca's Gustavo Cabral has been booked in Pachuca de Soto.
Free kick in a good position for Mazatlan!
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Pachuca a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Pachuca.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Martin Rodriguez.
Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of Pachuca.
Manuel Perez (Mazatlan) has replaced the possibly injured Martin Rodriguez.
In the minute 73, Erick Sanchez for Pachuca has been booked by Cesar Arturo Ramos and receives a first yellow card.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the home team a throw-in.
Victor Guzman is on a sub for Erick Sanchez for Pachuca.
In the minute 77, Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
Free kick Mazatlan.
Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Mazatlan.
In the minute 78, It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Pachuca throw-in in Mazatlan's half.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Pachuca in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 82, Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Mazatlan's Camilo Sanvezzo has run offside.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Mazatlan at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
Cesar Huerta levels the score at 3-3.
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
An attacking Pachuca player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Mazatlan’s Aldo Rocha is on his feet again at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Mazatlan have a goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 4-3.
Aldo Rocha is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Victor Guzman smashes in a penalty at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo. The score is now 4-3.
